title: [REPACK] World War 2 Battlefront Collection (H264)
description:
This torrent is a repack and re-encode of this torrent:
 <a href="
https://thepiratebay.se/torrent/4301892/World_War_II__BattleFront_Collection" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
https://thepiratebay.se/torrent/4301892/World_War_II__BattleFront_Collection</a>


ORIGINAL DESCRIPTION:

======

WWII BATTLEFRONT Collectors Box

5 DvDs 

English


-COLOR (NTSC) - run time 7hrs 30min

covers the war in the air, on the ground, and above and below the sea. covers both the allied and axis armies - Soldiers, sailors, marines, and airmen. 

======


The original collection was directly ripped DVD data, taking up 20 gigabytes of space. This re-encode to the more modern H264 format only takes up 4.5 Gigabytes of space, saving storage space and bandwidth for all.

Also, the DVD TOC data was troublesome, causing some work for our encoding guy, but he got the job done, so a round of applause for him, please.


Original Provider: TheeMalevolent
Encoder: rodent98
Redistribution: Gorgon Freeman

Seed to thank
